meta.description: Optimize the ordering of tables from suppliers A, B, and C to minimize cost while satisfying constraints.

sets.name: SUPPLIERS
sets.description: The suppliers from which tables can be ordered.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per table from each supplier.

params.name: tables_per_order
params.description: Number of tables included in each order from each supplier.

vars.name: orders
vars.description: Number of orders placed with each supplier.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(orders[s] * cost[s] * tables_per_order[s] for s in ['A', 'B', 'C'])
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of ordering tables.

constraints.name: min_tables
constraints.description: The restaurant needs to order at least 150 tables.

constraints.name: max_tables
constraints.description: The restaurant can order a maximum of 600 tables.

constraints.name: supplier_A_B_dependency
constraints.description: If ordering from supplier A, must order at least 30 tables from supplier B.

constraints.name: supplier_B_C_dependency
constraints.description: If ordering from supplier B, must also order from supplier C.
